email.title: DoCSoc Summer BBQ
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Hope that summer holidays are going well! Time has come for our mid-summer barbecue, which we will be hosting in Prince's Gardens! If you are around London next weekend and are looking to have a good time, please take a look at the event details below.
If you plan to go, **please get an Eventbrite ticket** so we can handle special requirements and buy enough food for everyone. Link here: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/docsoc-summer-bbq-tickets-67925883145

event.text:
Working or staying in London over the summer? Come on down to the DoCSoc summer BBQ for free food, drinks and laughs.
It will be held in Prince's Gardens from 12-5pm. Please click **Going** on the Facebook event if you plan on coming, and secure an Eventbrite ticket so that we have enough food for everyone!
While there will be lots of food, if you would like to bring some extra food or drinks, that would also be most welcome!
Note: you must be a member of DoCSoc to attend this event. Computing, JMC, and EIE students are automatically DoCSoc members. All other students must have a membership for the academic year 2019/20, bought after August 1st.
